name: Milo Creative
tagline: Seriously Playful Digital Products and Services
description:
We turn ideas into great digital products and design and develop apps that people love to use. 
 
We span the full lifecycle of digital projects and services, from a kernel of an idea to a fully fledged software solution. From games for children to smart health monitors, from education to apps for business, we can help your product fly.
 
We have been at the forefront of digital design from 2001, working with leading UK brands and institutions, with daring new startups and promising scale-ups, and with international organisations. 
 
We can work with you to solve a specific problem or help you all the way to launch and beyond. Our services include product strategy, UX design, user interface design, prototyping, visual design, branding, animation, game and app development for both mobile and web.
 
The breadth of experience and our expertise will help you develop the right product for your business.
